page.title: 11 COMMERCE
page.content: Trade:There are three main shops in the area:Crank Post Office sells stamps,stationery,tinned foods and fresh vegetables.It is also a Tourist Information Centre.Crank Post Office is run by a family and so employs no extra people.Ronnie Raspin owns a hardware shop which sells D.I.Y. equipment. Microman sells software for computers, and has six employees who are not local.Their goods are sold throughout the country. Garages:There are two garages in the area-Abbey Tyres does car repairs and M.O.T.'s.It has twenty-five employees, and two branches. Black's Garage also does M.O.T.'s.It employs three people,and is open six days a week. Both garages have been in existence for fifteen years.
